email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for 12,000MT of wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 230m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th November, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD45.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th November, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on 15th November, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Charterers
